description: The Cortland Apple (Malus 'Cortland') is an amazing variety of apple due to its exceptional crispness and sweetness. Its thick skin offers a gorgeous balance of sweet and tart flavors, while its crunchy texture is sure to satisfy. It is an all-purpose apple, meaning it can be eaten fresh, used in desserts and cooking, or juiced. The Cortland is also known for its long shelf life, making it a great choice for year-round use. Its bold red skin and white flesh add a visual pop in the kitchen, making it a lovely choice for decorations, pies, and other culinary treats. The Cortland Apple is a perfect choice for any apple lover!
